1.title: Rajasthan Tour
1.plot: Experience the culture of Rajasthan, The Land of Maharajas, in our all new season of #MyGreatEscape. From Royal Palaces to Religious Centres, Beautiful Lakes to Camel Safaris, this exotic land has covered it all. Stay tuned for the Series.

1.title: Sikkim Diaries: New Delhi, Gangtok, Lachung
1.plot: In this first season - "Sikkim Diaries", he invites you to be a part of his journey to one of the most beautiful Himalayan states of India, Sikkim. The episode covers his travel story from New Delhi to Gangtok to Lachung, before continuing his path towards the skies.

2.title: Sikkim Diaries 2: Yumthang Valley
2.plot: Coming back to the mountains year after year, I keep asking myself the same question, "Why don't I live here?" Life in the mountains is simple and it teaches you to appreciate the smaller things in the world. I wish everyone had a chance to spend some part of their lives on these mountains. Presenting to you the second episode of our travel series "My Great Escape - Sikkim Diaries", which takes you through my journey from Lachung to Yumthang Valley, one of the most serene places on earth, before heading back to Gangtok.

3.title: Sikkim Diaries 3: Gangtok and Tsomgo Lake
3.plot: Presenting to you the last episode of "Sikkim Diaries - My Great Escape", which takes you through my experiences in Gangtok and a drive to witness the ethereal beauty of the Tsomgo Lake, near Indo-China border.

1.title: Yosemite Valley
1.plot: Presenting to you, the ethereal beauty of Yosemite Valley, USA as part of our Travel Series "My Great Escape."

imdb.plot outline: A wise man once said, "We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us." There's so much in this world for all of us, if only we could have the eyes to see it and a heart to love it. Adwhyta proudly presents our new travel series "My Great Escape", which takes you through the world as experienced by MSN Karthik.
